settings.s008_b:
{name} - Channel title

{titleID} - Title ID

{console} - Selected console/platform

{type} - WAD type, can be either one of the following:
  "injected" - Value by default
  "VC" - Virtual Console backend
  "fwdr[+vWii]" - Forwarder channel
